product_name: Green Guru Cruiser Cooler Reycled Bike Tube Handlebar Bag
long_description: The Green Guru Cruiser Cooler Reycled Bike Tube handlebar bag offers a convenient, insulated place for a few beverages or your lunch, whether you're commuting to work or riding to a picnic. Handlebar bag is constructed out of recycled bicycle inner tubes and recycled PETE (plastic soda bottles) for highly water-resistant performance. Front flap opens up for quick access to the insulated interior; flap secures with rip-and-stick tabs. Rip-and-stick straps on back of bag make it easy to securely attach the bag to your handlebar. Webbing loops with reflective detailing let you affix a bike light for enhanced visibility in low light (light sold separately). Green Guru Cruiser Cooler Reycled Bike Tube handlebar bag is sized to hold 6 12 fl. oz. canned beverages or items approximately that size.
short_description: The Green Guru Cruiser Cooler Reycled Bike Tube handlebar bag offers a convenient, insulated place for a few beverages or your lunch, whether you're commuting to work or riding to a picnic.
